PageInfo.Message:
If you want to interrupt the game, please go to
[<KC UI_GAME_MENU>] Game Menu《Options》
and select<COL ffdc78>《Exit Game》</COL>
When you log out, the game will automatically
save your previous play record.
When you restart the game, you will start from
the White Dragon Temple 《Central Square》, not from
your last location.
